trends: There has been one other sighting in chapleau
There were no other sightings in chapleau on or around July 14th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: seen bright light in the sky and took 3 pictures in july forgot about them till now
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting around my fire pit having a few cold ones .At around 10;30 pm 2 military jets flew over my house ,so i went into my house and got my camera to get a pic if they returned they didnt. later that night at 3.38am (camera showes 4.38am not set for daylight savings time.)Seen what i thought was a brighter than normal star , light ,thought id take some pics of it .It was stationary in the sky as i took the pics i zoomed in on it on the 3rd pic i looked down at my camera to check pic then looked back up and the light was gone.Forgot about the pics till i loaded them into my computer,on dec5 2012.Each pic gets stranger as they progress. Didnt think anything of it till i seen the full pic and zoomed in on it.Not the first time ive seen this kind of light in the sky. MUFO please feel free to contact me by my above information.
